FRISteam.Strategies.Synonyms package¶

Submodules¶

FRISteam.Strategies.Synonyms.synonyms module¶

The module containing functions for finding synonyms

FRISteam.Strategies.Synonyms.synonyms.get_synonym_by_word(word, langTag, maxSynonyms)¶

function get_synonym_by_word: get synonyms from a word in a specified language

Args:

word (string): the word to find synonyms for langTag (string): the language of the word (e.g. ‘eng’ for English and ‘nld’ for Dutch) maxSynonyms (integer): the maximum number of synonyms that should be returned

Returns:

list: List of [synonym_string, frequency_score]

FRISteam.Strategies.Synonyms.synonyms.get_synonym_by_word_list(wordList, langTag, maxSynonyms)¶

function get_synonym_by_word_list : get synonyms from a list of words in a specified language

Args:

wordList (list(string)): the list of words to find synonyms for langTag (string): the language of the words in wordList and the synonyms (e.g. ‘eng’ for English and ‘nld’ for Dutch) maxSynonyms (integer): the maximum number of synonyms that should be returned for each word

Returns:

list: [list of original words, list of [synonym_string, frequency_score] in order of original words]
